## Lab 3: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
- Description

This project analyzes a dataset of 1.5 million records and 58 features regarding social media user behavior. It covers demographics, lifestyle (exercise, sleep, diet), and Instagram engagement metrics (reels, stories, and security settings).
Tasks Completed

    Data Integrity: Verified the dataset is clean with 0 missing values.

    Uniqueness: Confirmed 0 duplicate rows.

    EDA: Explored the structural distribution of user engagement and lifestyle data.


- Technologies Used

    Python

    Pandas

    Jupyter Notebook
